alert.note: Alert for Forest; Lincoln; Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Forest, northern Lincoln, Vilas and Oneida Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 930 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Johnson Lake Barrens Natural Area to 8 miles north of Rainbow Flowage to near Prentice. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Rainbow Flowage around 935 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Eagle River, Phelps, Tomahawk, Gilbert and Kentuck Lake Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
